resources.string: You are about to start receiving new (base) IRMA credentials. If you already have a set of credentials, then this step might overwrite some of those. During this process your passport will be read remotely and the contents will be compared to the subscription information known for this phone. If the passport data matches the subscription data, a set of base credentials will be issued to your IRMA app.

This process consists of the following three steps:

  1.  Taking a photo of your passport;
  2.  Reading data from your passport;
  3.  Issuing the credential.

During the final process, your name, date and place of birth, and your IMSI will be transmitted to the enrollment server (%1$s).

For more invormation, see here.

Proceed?
Passport data matched to subscriber data. \n Continue to MijnOverheid.nl to receive credentials.
This phone does not support NFC.
NFC is disabled. Please enable NFC in the phone settings before using this feature.
The issuing of the credential failed.
Could not connect to the enrollment server.
Received no response from the enrollment server.
The enrollment server returned an invalid response.
Failed to establish contact with the passport.
BAC data seems to be wrong.
Document number, date of birth or date of expiry not set.
OCR-ing the BAC data is not yet supported. Please enter the BAC data manually here.
